Eagles' Michael Vick , Ben Roethlisberger might be the toughest quarterback to sack, said Jets defensive end Shaun Ellis. "He's very strong. He's very elusive in the pocket," Ellis said. A lot of people don't realize how fast he is.... I know he looks slow moving around on the field, but he's pretty nifty at what he does.
